title: Do you know when the yellow fly and deer fly season will be done in New hanover County? We have so many of these pests biting us in our backyard right now. I hear that regular fly traps won\'t catch them. Deet doesn\'t stop them either. I\'m hoping to rig up some kind of tanglefoot/blueball trap soon. I hope it will work. I\'m afaid to let my kids play in the backyard. The bite area swells large and itches for many days.
text:
